entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries this morning. Clearing late this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 18 this morning and minus 5 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Monday 3 April 2023
